/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A red truck is parked on the side of the road, its vibrant color contrasting with the greenery. In the distance, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
